title: Not normal High Ping all of a sudden
body: Normally i play around 100 ping, now its around 165. Just started today. Could the new patch be the cause?

replies.body: My ping starts to get high every day around 8:00. Normally it's 33 or so, and now it's 170. Doesn't go away for a very long time each time. ISP = Comcast
I'm having the same exact problem. My ping spikes from 30ish to 150+ at 8 PM every day, and I can't find out why. This started about a week ago. My ISP is Comcast as well.
The same exact thing is also happening to me I have Fios in florida as well
Yup, same ISP and location.....sucks.
BSNL Ernakulam,Kochi
If you are having connection issues can you also give us your ISP and location so we can zero in a bit further. Thanks!
Time Warner Cable Internet LLC, Buffalo, New York
Bell. Toronto, Ontario

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Superfoxman,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1WGucW4x,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2015-07-22T05:08:05.113+0000)
>
> If you are having connection issues can you also give us your ISP and location so we can zero in a bit further. Thanks!

Cox Communications. New Orleans, LA
COX Oklahoma city, Oklahoma
Coho, Portland OR.
Comcast, San Francisco.

Had this happen before, ended up upgrading internet from 20 bytes per sec to 50 and it has worked until a recent issue with the 5.13 riven recall bug-fix which is unrelated to my internet provider. It is most likely the traffic with your internet provider and your internet provider short-cutting you and giving you less priority than the people paying for higher connection. I am not an expert, but that is just my theory on what is happening.
My ping right now is 150-200 normally 84. I live in Fl. provider=Comcast.
Cox Communications, Edmond, Oklahoma    Suburb of OKC.

Having this same issue but mine is a bit more extreme from champ select you can "feel" a bit of lagginess while switch runes/masteries and picking a champ. Then in-game it starts off fairly normal then after about 2 mins the latency ramps up from my normal 70ms all the way to 500ms and disconnects me. Won't even let me reconnect to the game. Actually doesn't even me close out league via task manager so i can restart client. RITO PLZ

Reporting on behalf of friend. Bay Area, CA as well. Every night around the same time. Ping usually 40, goes up to 200 now.

As for myself I noticed my ping rises for a few hours middle of the night pretty much daily. Not quite so high, but it's the highest i've ever seen it. NY. Time Warner Cable user.

Comcast - SF Bay Area

I've also been having this issue.  Normally at around 60-80 ping, and am at a constant 200 now.
also bay area, CA, comcast

Hello,

Can you please post your ISP and location if this is ongoing. We have tried to make some adjustments to Cox routing as we have noticed some possible congestion towards their network. 

Thanks
Bay Area, CA, Comcast
Same issues, Cox Communications- Tulsa OK

I have 15k ping and keep on dcing..I lost two ranked games because I kept on dcing and my teammates at end screen kept telling other people to report me for afk. I reconnected to the game when I could but couldnt play well cause i had constantly spiking ping. Its normally around 75-80ish but it kept on spiking to 2k and then 15k.
Yea just checked mine too seems like it is better.
My ping seems to be fixed as of now.
Think it's happening only in the east coast. Newport News Va here
^Also from Norfolk, VA and same exact shit. Steady 165
I just 3 ran different speed test off 3 different host, I posted on your Thread the results. Highest was 31ms ping from Chesapeake lowest 18ms from Richmond
well i guess we just screwed for today, ping still the same even on bots hahah love it

It has to be their east coast networks, i was literally playing fine most of the day and now i have a steady 160+ ping and takes forever to connect.  I'm also in Norfolk, VA with Cox cable.  But obviously numerous ppl from east coast are having same problems with numerous ISP.

> [{quoted}](name=Master Ry,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=1WGucW4x,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2015-07-22T00:24:45.256+0000)

Same exact issue and everything man, add me if you want I'm from Norfolk also! 757 Represent =D

Central Florida, Verizon Fios 

Normally get 119 ping and now it's been around 170-200 with packet loss as well.

Same here, I have Cox Cable and live in Norfolk,VA and it's really starting to get annoying! Ping shoots through the roof 199-500 ping. I've been playing for 1 year now and this is the 2nd time I've ever experienced this issue with ping spiking through the roof. My normal ping holds nicely at 80-99 this shit is just unplayable and unenjoyable right now! Seems like most of the comments are East Coast. All my West Coast friends tell me they have NO issues! I find this very aggravating right now!
Same is happening to me have Cox Internet in Virginia did a speed test and have 100 mbps but on Leagues steady 160 ping when I usually have 90 ping.

Same here, I have Cox Cable and live in Norfolk,VA and it's really starting to get annoying! Ping shoots through the roof 199-500 ping. I've been playing for 1 year now and this is the 2nd time I've ever experienced this issue with ping spiking through the roof. My normal ping holds nicely at 80-99 this shit is just unplayable and unenjoyable right now! Seems like most of the comments are East Coast. All my West Coast friends tell me they have NO issues! I find this very aggravating right now!
I run 100-105 ping all day, now i'm sitting at 160-165 constant.  Whats up Riot?
Just wanted to say that I am having the exact same issue as OP. It's also weird that my normal ping is higher than his normal ping but his high ping is exactly the same as mine, 165.
Anyone have a fix literally lost 3 ranked games in a row cause of this. Ping was fine in the morning just recently had a steady 170

I have Cox and I normally run 104 ping. An hour ago it jumped to 210 and stayed there the entire game. Now it is sitting at a steady 165. Ran all sorts of test on my network. Tracert reveals a problem for me after hop 6, which is well before Riots servers. Looks like a pathing issue. It's like a chain effect after hop 6. Hopefully the host of that data center will get the issue resolved quickly. I live in Georgia So if anyone is on cox in my area we may be taking a similar route to the game servers.

yep that what happened to me it was annoying and i would freeze for couple seconds after casting a skill too.

I got FIOS in Florida

Run a Tracert to 192.64.170.252

see if you have any drops in the hops like around hop 6 or so.
I have no clue why only few ppl getting that i guess we just out of luck
Has this happened before? If so, i wonder how long it would take to fix?
I never had a problem ever like that, O_O only problem i had when everyone was lagging on both teams. But just me never had that before O_o and everything is fine on my side too .
i have cox internet. yeah i test it and everything is fine with my internet provider.
i have Cox as well and it just started up for my last game.  I am assuming it was on the other team too because they had someone who was DC'd for over half of it.
Yea, everything runs just fine, just the league is not. Ehhh this is sux >_< and i actually had a lot of free time today too oh well i guess my luck
wonder why it only effects some people

Yep same thing here, out of no where one gmae was perfect and now I cant even play love it....

What you got ATT/Brithhouse/FIOS?
